price: And We have made the sky a well-protected canopy, yet they turn away from its signs[15].
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: [15] Such as the sun and the moon.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
